<result>
# Portfolio Development Guide

## Build & Test Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server with Turbopack
- `npm run build` - Production build
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint
- `npm run test` - Run all tests with Vitest
- `npm run test:watch` - Watch mode
- `npm run test -- src/lib/__tests__/blog.test.ts` - Single test file
- `npm run type-check` - TypeScript validation

## Code Style
- TypeScript strict mode with path aliases (@/*)
- Functional components with TypeScript interfaces
- Tailwind CSS with custom design tokens (CSS variables)
- Named exports for components, default for pages
- Tests: `*.test.ts(x)` in `__tests__/` directories using Vitest

## Architecture Patterns
- App Router (Next.js 15) with metadata API for SEO
- MDX blog with gray-matter frontmatter parsing
- Components: UI primitives in `/ui`, features in `/components`
- Content in `/content/blog/` as `.mdx` files

## Key Conventions
- Import order: React, Next, external libs, internal (@/)
- Error handling: Use TypeScript types, validate with Zod schemas
- Prefer server components; 'use client' only when needed
- Test colocated with source in `__tests__` folders
- All SEO: metadata exports in page.tsx + JSON-LD in components

## Content Workflow
- Blog posts: Add `.mdx` to `/content/blog/` with required frontmatter
- Required fields: title, date, excerpt, category, tags, author, readTime
- Images: Place in `/public/images/` and reference with leading `/`
</result>

<result>
export interface BlogPost {
  slug: string
  title: string
  date: string
  excerpt: string
  content: string
  category: string
  tags: string[]
  author: string
  readTime: string
  image?: string
  featured?: boolean
}

export interface BlogPostMeta {
  slug: string
  title: string
  date: string
  excerpt: string
  category: string
  tags: string[]
  author: string
  readTime: string
  image?: string
  featured?: boolean
}
</result>

<function_calls>
<invoke name="Read">
<parameter name="file_path">/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/lib/blog.ts</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<result>
import fs from 'fs'
import path from 'path'
import matter from 'gray-matter'
import { BlogPost, BlogPostMeta } from '@/types/blog'

const postsDirectory = path.join(process.cwd(), 'content/blog')

export function getAllPosts(): BlogPostMeta[] {
  const fileNames = fs.readdirSync(postsDirectory)
  const allPostsData = fileNames
    .filter((fileName) => fileName.endsWith('.mdx'))
    .map((fileName) => {
      const slug = fileName.replace(/\.mdx$/, '')
      const fullPath = path.join(postsDirectory, fileName)
      const fileContents = fs.readFileSync(fullPath, 'utf8')
      const { data } = matter(fileContents)

      return {
        slug,
        title: data.title,
        date: data.date,
        excerpt: data.excerpt,
        category: data.category,
        tags: data.tags || [],
        author: data.author,
        readTime: data.readTime,
        image: data.image,
        featured: data.featured || false,
      } as BlogPostMeta
    })

  return allPostsData.sort((a, b) => (a.date < b.date ? 1 : -1))
}

export function getPostBySlug(slug: string): BlogPost | null {
  try {
    const fullPath = path.join(postsDirectory, `${slug}.mdx`)
    const fileContents = fs.readFileSync(fullPath, 'utf8')
    const { data, content } = matter(fileContents)

    return {
      slug,
      title: data.title,
      date: data.date,
      excerpt: data.excerpt,
      content,
      category: data.category,
      tags: data.tags || [],
      author: data.author,
      readTime: data.readTime,
      image: data.image,
      featured: data.featured || false,
    }
  } catch {
    return null
  }
}

export function getPostSlugs(): string[] {
  const fileNames = fs.readdirSync(postsDirectory)
  return fileNames
    .filter((fileName) => fileName.endsWith('.mdx'))
    .map((fileName) => fileName.replace(/\.mdx$/, ''))
}
</result>

import type { Metadata } from "next";
import { Inter } from "next/font/google";
import "./globals.css";
import { Header } from "@/components/Header";
import { Footer } from "@/components/Footer";
import { ThemeProvider } from "@/components/ThemeProvider";

const inter = Inter({
  subsets: ["latin"],
  display: "swap",
  variable: "--font-inter",
});

export const metadata: Metadata = {
  title: {
    default: "Daniel Fotes | Senior Software Engineer",
    template: "%s | Daniel Fotes",
  },
  description:
    "Senior Software Engineer specializing in React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. Building scalable applications with clean code and great user experiences.",
  keywords: [
    "Software Engineer",
    "React Developer",
    "TypeScript",
    "Next.js",
    "Full Stack Developer",
    "Web Development",
  ],
  authors: [{ name: "Daniel Fotes" }],
  creator: "Daniel Fotes",
  metadataBase: new URL("https://danielfotes.com"),
  openGraph: {
    type: "website",
    locale: "en_US",
    url: "https://danielfotes.com",
    siteName: "Daniel Fotes",
    title: "Daniel Fotes | Senior Software Engineer",
    description:
      "Senior Software Engineer specializing in React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.",
    images: [
      {
        url: "/og-image.png",
        width: 1200,
        height: 630,
        alt: "Daniel Fotes - Senior Software Engineer",
      },
    ],
  },
  twitter: {
    card: "summary_large_image",
    title: "Daniel Fotes | Senior Software Engineer",
    description:
      "Senior Software Engineer specializing in React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.",
    images: ["/og-image.png"],
  },
  robots: {
    index: true,
    follow: true,
    googleBot: {
      index: true,
      follow: true,
      "max-video-preview": -1,
      "max-image-preview": "large",
      "max-snippet": -1,
    },
  },
};

export default function RootLayout({
  children,
}: Readonly<{
  children: React.ReactNode;
}>) {
  return (
    <html lang="en" suppressHydrationWarning className={inter.variable}>
      <body className="min-h-screen flex flex-col bg-background text-foreground antialiased">
        <ThemeProvider
          attribute="class"
          defaultTheme="system"
          enableSystem
          disableTransitionOnChange
        >
          <Header />
          <main className="flex-grow">{children}</main>
          <Footer />
        </ThemeProvider>
      </body>
    </html>
  );
}

import Link from "next/link";
import { getAllPosts } from "@/lib/blog";
import { BlogCard } from "@/components/BlogCard";
import { StructuredData } from "@/components/StructuredData";

export default function Home() {
  const posts = getAllPosts();
  const featuredPosts = posts.filter((post) => post.featured).slice(0, 3);
  const recentPosts =
    featuredPosts.length > 0 ? featuredPosts : posts.slice(0, 3);

  return (
    <>
      <StructuredData type="website" />
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="py-20 md:py-28">
        <div className="container mx-auto px-4 max-w-4xl">
          <div className="space-y-6">
            <h1 className="text-4xl md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl font-bold tracking-tight">
              Hi, I&apos;m{" "}
              <span className="text-primary">Daniel Fotes</span>
            </h1>
            <p className="text-xl md:text-2xl text-muted-foreground max-w-2xl">
              Senior Software Engineer specializing in{" "}
              <span className="text-foreground font-medium">React</span>,{" "}
              <span className="text-foreground font-medium">TypeScript</span>,
              and modern web technologies.
            </p>
            <p className="text-lg text-muted-foreground max-w-2xl">
              I build scalable applications with clean code and great user
              experiences. Currently focused on full-stack development with
              Next.js and cloud technologies.
            </p>
            <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-4 pt-4">
              <Link
                href="/projects"
                className="inline-flex items-center justify-center px-6 py-3 bg-primary text-primary-foreground rounded-lg font-medium hover:bg-primary/90 transition-colors"
              >
                View My Work
              </Link>
              <Link
                href="/about"
                className="inline-flex items-center justify-center px-6 py-3 border border-border rounded-lg font-medium hover:bg-muted transition-colors"
              >
                About Me
              </Link>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Featured Posts Section */}
      <section className="py-16 bg-muted/50">
        <div className="container mx-auto px-4 max-w-6xl">
          <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-8">
            <h2 className="text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold">
              {featuredPosts.length > 0 ? "Featured Posts" : "Recent Posts"}
            </h2>
            <Link
              href="/blog"
              className="text-primary hover:text-primary/80 font-medium transition-colors"
            >
              View All Posts â†’
            </Link>
          </div>
          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
            {recentPosts.map((post) => (
              <BlogCard key={post.slug} post={post} />
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Skills Section */}
      <section className="py-16">
        <div className="container mx-auto px-4 max-w-4xl">
          <h2 className="text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold mb-8 text-center">
            Technologies I Work With
          </h2>
          <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4">
            {[
              "React",
              "TypeScript",
              "Next.js",
              "Node.js",
              "PostgreSQL",
              "AWS",
              "Docker",
              "GraphQL",
            ].map((skill) => (
              <div
                key={skill}
                className="p-4 bg-muted rounded-lg text-center font-medium hover:bg-muted/80 transition-colors"
              >
                {skill}
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>
    </>
  );
}
</result>

I have completed my warmup exploration of the codebase. Here is a summary of what I found:

## Portfolio Codebase Overview

This is a **Next.js 15 portfolio website** with the following characteristics:

### Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 15 with App Router and Turbopack
- **Language**: TypeScript (strict mode)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS v4 with custom design tokens
- **Content**: MDX blog posts with gray-matter frontmatter parsing
- **Testing**: Vitest with Testing Library
- **Other**: Framer Motion, Zod for validation, next-themes for dark mode

### Project Structure
```
/src
  /app          - Next.js App Router pages (layout, page, blog/, projects/, about/)
  /components   - React components (Header, Footer, BlogCard, etc.)
  /components/ui - UI primitives (button, theme-toggle)
  /lib          - Utilities (blog.ts, metadata.ts)
  /types        - TypeScript interfaces (blog.ts)

/content
  /blog         - MDX blog posts (5 posts currently)
  /docs, /drafts, /guides, /projects, /templates - Content directories
```

### Key Patterns
- Server Components by default, 'use client' only when needed
- SEO via metadata API + JSON-LD structured data
- Blog system reads MDX files from `/content/blog/` with frontmatter
- Path aliases (`@/*` maps to `./src/*`)
- Tests colocated in `__tests__/` directories

### Critical Files for Understanding the Codebase
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/CLAUDE.md` - Development guide and conventions
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/lib/blog.ts` - Core blog content loading logic
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/app/layout.tsx` - Root layout with metadata and providers
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/types/blog.ts` - TypeScript interfaces for blog content
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/app/page.tsx` - Homepage with featured posts and skills
